check.name: LocalVariableName
check.description:
Checks that local, non-{@code final} variable names conform to a specified pattern. A catch parameter is considered to be a local variable.

This check does not support pattern variables. Instead, use PatternVariableName.

property.name: allowOneCharVarInForLoop
property.description: Allow one character variable name in initialization expressions in FOR loop if one char variable name is prohibited by {@code format} regexp.

property.name: format
property.description: Sets the pattern to match valid identifiers.
